articles.author: New York Post
articles.title: What is a woman?
articles.description: Harris has a commanding lead over Donald Trump among female voters everywhere, including the critical swing states. Her answer would indicate if her administration would gut Title IX protections for women’s sports and green-light gender ideologues who want children and adolescents to have easier access to medical interventions while erecting legal barriers between parents and children.
articles.content:
What is a woman?
It’s a question Kamala Harris will ghost unless asked at Tuesday’s presidential debate.
